Welcome to Glam, the newest addition to Cali. With us you will feel at home with our modern and cozy spaces, also you can enjoy a refreshing drink at our bar in the beautiful terrace-patio that we have for you.

Glam is located in the heart of Granada neighborhood, Cali´s trendiest spot, where you can find restaurants, ATM machines, drugstores, nightclubs, shopping stores and bakeries in less than 50 meters from us.

At Glam hostel we offer a variety of private and shared rooms, is up to you!

The hotel offers a barbecue.

Popular points of interest near GLAM Hotel include Cali's Tower, Caycedo's Square and Cali's city Theatre. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

description.description: If you are thinking about comfort, economy and fun, Hotel GLAM is your best option! Located in the distinguished sector of Granada a few steps from the best area of the Gastronomic Zone of Cali, Boutiques of the most renowned designers in Colombia, with the best Rumba and Fun Sites. GLAM Hotel features a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Cali. Around 2 km from Saint's Peter Cathedral, the property is also 2.5 km away from Jorge Isaacs Theater and offers free WiFi. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.
